messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] great schism
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m not Sandra, but I can tell you what I remember about the great schism....just so you can all laugh! It was in 1054.  I ll never forget, because the
messages.messageBody:
> here's a? for you sandra. didn't the orthodox church precede the catholic?
> what do you know about the great schism?

I'm not Sandra, but I can tell you what I remember about the great
schism....just so you can all laugh!

It was in 1054. I'll never forget, because the combination lock on our
common storage area from seminary housing (back when my husband was doin'
that) was keyed to the year to make it easy for the students to remember!

but I did always think that the orthodox left the catholics, and not the
other way around...

brenda
